searchBook.author: //*[@class="booktag"]/a
searchBook.JSParser:
function functionName(config, jsparams, result) {       let list = [];       var urls = result.list[0].detailUrl.split("
");       var titles=result.list[0].bookName.split("
");var authors = result.list[0].author.split("
");var lastChapterTitles=result.list[0]. lastChapterTitle.split("
");       var covers=result.list[0].cover.split("
");                     for (let j = 0; j < titles.length; j++) {                list.push({"bookName": titles[j], "author": authors[j], "lastChapterTitle": lastChapterTitles[j], "detailUrl": urls[j], "cover": covers[j]})            }                return { "list": list};}
